publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-260 Cathy Jamieson: The Draft Advice and Assistance (Assistance By Way of Representation) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2003-That the Justice 1 Committee, in consideration to the draft Advice and Assistance (Assistance by Way of Representation) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2003, recommends that the regulations be approved. Supported by: Hugh Henry*
